Heathrow Terminal 2 setting high standards of airport experience Published on : Saturday, October 10, 2015
The Terminal 2 at the Heathrow Airport in London is setting new standards, offering efficient and seamless airport experiences in the world. Affectionately known as ‘The Queen’s Terminal’, travelers from all round the world are showering accolades since its opening in June 2014.
Amadeus along with Heathrow Airport, Star Alliance and its airline members along with the airport facility service provider ASIG has been in close collaboration to present the Queen’s Terminal its present fame. The collaboration takes care of the cutting edge technology the airport offers along with a seamless airport experience.
After all these efforts put in at the Heathrow Terminal 2, travelers are experiencing a smooth and efficient functioning that is really setting new standards. Travelers can use any self-service kiosk and any bag drop touch point in one of the four check-in zones, regardless of which airline they are flying with. This facility is helping travelers save a lot of time and accelerated pre-departure experience and also ensures a consistent level of service across alliance partners.
As many as 23 Star Alliance member airlines are united under the roof of Heathrow Terminal 2 offering a different standard of airport experience which is innovative and out of the box.
